title: Tom Harkin
summary: Thomas Richard Harkin (born November 19, 1939) is an American lawyer, author, and politician who served as a United States Senator from Iowa from 1985 to 2015. A member of the Democratic Party, he previously was the U.S. Representative for Iowa's 5th congressional district from 1975 to 1985. He is the longest-serving senator to spend his whole tenure as a state's junior senator.
